alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 8:32PM CDT until further notice by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Big Sunflower River At Sunflower affecting Sunflower County. Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Carroll and Leflore Counties. For the Lower Yazoo ...including Whaley, Greenwood, Belzoni, Yazoo City, Sunflower, Anguilla...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yazoo River At Yazoo City. * WHEN...From Saturday morning until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6 PM CDT Friday the stage was 27.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 31.5 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Yazoo River Yazoo City 29.0 27.4 Fri 6 pm CDT 29.7 30.8 31.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 830 AM CDT.
